name: Numbers Battle: Shooting Numbers Game
description:
Numbers Battle is a brand new game. Shoot and win the battle.

Google Play Store: Numbers Battle: Shooting Numbers

Apple App Store: Numbers Battle: Shooting Numbers

Amazon App Store: Numbers Battle: Shooting Numbers

Your mission is to destroy all numbers by shooting the correct bullets on each number.

You have to touch the red button to shoot red numbers and touch the green button to shoot the green numbers. If the hit is correct, the number will be decreased by 1 and the score will be increased by 5. Otherwise, the number will be increased by 1 and the score will be decreased by 2.

When you destroy all numbers, a new wave will come with more numbers.

It is game over when the numbers hit the gun.

Play, enjoy and have fun !
